userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Use microfilm copy, Fluvanna County (Va.) Reel 1.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fluvanna County (Va.) Deed Book, 1777-1783. Fluvanna County (Va.) Reel 1, Local government records collection, Fluvanna County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Fluvanna County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Fluvanna County was formed in 1777 from Albemarle County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Deed Book, 1777-1783, of Fluvanna County Court. The deed book records the name of the grantor and grantee, the residence of both individuals and the description of property being sold or transferred. The volume has an index which contains the first and last names of both parties. It is arranged alphabetically from A-Z.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Fluvanna County Deed Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult A Guide to Virginia County and City Records On Microfilm found on the Library of Virginia web site.

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Fluvanna County.
